entries.meaning: (India, dated) An Indian translator or interpreter.
examples: […]  inhabitants complain to him, and as he does not understand the language he is obliged to call for his dubash to interpret what they say;  […]

entries.meaning: (India, dated) An Indian general household steward.
examples: This I learnt was the captain's dubash, a native man acting as general steward who provides every household article as well as of merchandise, and engages all inferior servants.
